flavor.reason: Mixed reviews highlight both enjoyable hearty breakfast options and issues with bland or poorly prepared dishes.

freshness.reason: Concerns about stale ingredients and poor food handling overshadow the use of some fresh items.

service.reason: Inconsistent service quality with reports of delays and unprofessional behavior.

environment.reason: Retro decor and central location are appreciated, but maintenance issues detract from the experience.

value.reason: Prices are seen as unjustified by the food quality, despite the convenient location.
